key: This will process the document to recognize it's text. The original file will be added as a supporting file.
The OCR engine couldn't read the document due to a malformed format. Last updated

This will enable the Optical Character Recognition (OCR) functionality for PDF documents. This service will recognize text inside images, such as scanned documents and photos, and convert it into machine-readable text data.
When activated, this will enable administrator and editor users to send PDF documents to the OCR service.
